definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: Two of the best M4/3 adaptors I have ever used.
sentences.chinese: 我用過的轉接頭中製作最嚴謹的兩個轉接頭。

sentences.english: Two of the best M4/3 adaptors I have ever used.
sentences.chinese: 我用過的轉接頭中製作最嚴謹的兩個轉接頭。

sentences.english: Can you put me through to customer service?
sentences.chinese: 你可以幫我轉接到客服部嗎？

sentences.english: I need an adaptor for a three-pin plug.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一個三腳插頭的轉接頭。

sentences.english: There are also four adapters to charge some popular brand mobile phones.
sentences.chinese: 另外附帶四個轉接頭可以連接大多數品牌手機。

sentences.english: Hello, welcome to Wenzhou Chengjia Stationery Limited Company. Please hold on…
sentences.chinese: 歡迎您致電溫州市成佳文具有限公司，請稍等已轉接。

sentences.english: The operator will connect you with our sales department.
sentences.chinese: 接線員將把您的電話轉接到銷售部。

sentences.english: I need an adapter for this voltage converter.
sentences.chinese: 我需要爲這個變壓器搭配一個轉接器。

sentences.english: Let me transfer you to the right department.
sentences.chinese: 讓我給您轉接您要的部門。

sentences.english: Hello, operator?Could you put me through the room 102?
sentences.chinese: 你好接線員，能幫我轉接到102號房嗎？

sentences.english: Without an adapter, I can't use my shaver or dryer.
sentences.chinese: 沒有轉接器我就不能用我的刮鬍刀或吹風機了。

sentences.english: Adapters to fit needle to cartridge.
sentences.chinese: 用來將針頭安裝在膠筒上的轉接頭。

sentences.english: Can you put me through to extension 4567?
sentences.chinese: 你可以幫我轉接分機4567嗎？

sentences.english: We cannot transfer your call to the Chinese Restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 我們無法爲您轉接中式餐廳。

definition: to give orders/to spread news or rumors/to leak certain information intentionally
to move one's base (of operations)/to reposition/to relocate
body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
